bible.derived: Masoretic, DSS, Majority Text, Aramaic Peshitta.

translations.name: HalleluYah Scriptures
translations.description: The HalleluYah Scriptures Hebrew English Parallel Edition contains an English translation of the scriptures and Modern Hebrew translations of the scriptures side-by-side. The name of God and the Son are presented in paleo-Hebrew text on both the English and Hebrew sides of the text. The HalleluYah Scriptures Parallel Bible does not have footnotes or commentary of any kind.
